data.name: Zeliria Sanctuary
data.detailed_description:
As a result of the experiment, the main character of the game, Maxx goes through a portal gate from Earth to an amazing planet where everlasting summer reigns. A planet with tropical forests and no highways. A planet where sakura does not bloom, but TWIT grows. A planet, where there are seductive assassins and kings' tyranny. Here you can found not only cat-girls, but even purple hamsters, who have enormous power.
Was it his fault or some divine intervention? Why did he agree to the experiment? Can he go back or just starlight will remind him of home? Will he enjoy wonderful everyday here or die ignominiously?
Past life is gone forever and you need to solve the riddles of the new planet and build relationships with new friends. In this world, everything is not so simple and Maxx needs to decide who he can trust and who can stab him in the back. Gradually, the question how to get back is less and less relevant for our hero.


Our game is a unique mix of two styles. You'll get opening and closing arts in real-style and the rest game in anime. A colorful and dynamic adult story about the adventures of special forces soldier Maxx in the mysterious world of Zeliria. Zeliria... A dangerous, still beautiful planet, where neko live side by side with knights.
A game where you decide the fate of the hero.





Our visual novel combines fantasy, drama, romance, humor, thriller, and of course beautiful girls and fluffy (not)humster.




  • about 15 Hours Of Gameplay
  • 100+ arts
  • 30+ Realistic Backgrounds
  • Multiplatform
  • Piles of additional materials: Bestiary, Pantheon of Zeliria, History of the World, etc;




  • dynamic and Exciting story;
  • a lot of choices that cardinally influence the further events;
  • 11 different endings (not counting the bad endings!);
  • 2 open endings;
  • three girls, each with her own story and several possible endings;
  • carefully crafted world with its own laws and history;
  • vivid unique characters;
  • variety of fantastic beasts that you will not find anywhere else;
  • fantastic humor and selective sarcasm;
  • stunning scenery;
  • final arts in realistic style;
  • and of coursel scenes about love!

data.short_description: Sense of reality has not yet returned after a teleportation experiment. Purple hamsters, girls with tails, medieval knights - a fantastic world of an alien planet, where you will lead special forces soldier...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8
  • Processor: Intel atom Z3xx (Silvermont)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series. 1280x720 or better required
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 850 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit ver)
  • Processor: Core i5 of Ivy Bridge generation or better or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or Nvidia (VRAM 1GB or better). Recommended 1920x1080
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compatible
  • Storage: 850 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compatible
  • Storage: 850 MB available space
